data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Montana.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Montana, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Montana, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Montana, Bulgaria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Montana.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Montana, Bulgaria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 122,915 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Montana, Bulgaria. Please, stir the 2,485 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.section_summary:
the state of Montana, Bulgaria has a population of 125,400.

We estimate Montana has 2,485 people who might know Jesus, 100,814 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22,101 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Montana will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
